Flexible.Title: Specially handled fields for spell fields / did you mean 4
Flexible.Code: <lst name="spellcheck"> <lst name="suggestions"> <lst name="opencns"> <int name="numFound">1</int> <int name="startOffset">1</int> <int name="endOffset">8</int> <arr name="suggestion"> <str>opencms</str> </arr> </lst> <lst name="opencns roks"> <int name="numFound">1</int> <int name="startOffset">1</int> <int name="endOffset">13</int> <arr name="suggestion"> <str>opencms rocks</str> </arr> </lst> </lst> </lst>
